      Returns:
      The rider's elapsed time in nanoseconds.

    • getRiderAdjustedElapsedTime

      public LocalTime getRiderAdjustedElapsedTime(int riderId)
      Get a rider's adjusted elapsed time. If the rider finished within 1 second of another rider, then both rider's have the elapsed time of the quicker result.
      Parameters:
      riderId - Rider's ID.
      Returns:
      The Rider's adjusted elapsed time in nanoseconds.

    • getRidersRanks

      public int[] getRidersRanks()
      Return the array of rider's IDs when sorted by their elapsed time in the stage.
      Returns:
      An integer array containing the rider's IDs sorted in ascending order by their elapsed time.
